function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Considering the limitations of geographical distance even in the presence of virtual technologies","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementing strict health and safety protocols for remote interactions, including regular testing, vaccination requirements, and hygiene measures.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforcing strict guidelines for virtual interactions, including adherence to health protocols, vaccination requirements, and regular health screenings.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Raising awareness about disease transmission risks in virtual settings, implementing virtual health monitoring solutions, and promoting virtual behaviors that reduce the spread of illness.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provide clear and specific guidelines on the use of de-spatialization and spatialization in pandemic control, and offer training to ensure understanding of the differences and their implications for disease prevention.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Develop contingency plans for deploying human resources in emergency situations, invest in workforce training for pandemic response, and explore hybrid models combining automation with human involvement.","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting further research to identify and address the challenges in 5g technology, and promoting the development of practical application scenarios.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Promoting awareness of the potential social and business values of 5g, and encouraging the exploration of practical applications in pandemic prevention and control.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diversification of medical care access points, use of alternative communication technologies","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provision of immersive entertainment and psychotherapy through 5g-based vr/ar technologies","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increase investment in research and production of test toolkits, improve coordination with public health organizations","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Community engagement and education, streamlined guidelines for lockdown, investment in digital infrastructure for effective remote operations","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid deployment of relevant 5g-based equipment, effective screening measures for floating population, efficient resource delivery to people in lockdown","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Investment in research and development of vaccines and medicine, international cooperation in sharing resources","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Investment in infrastructure for widespread 5g
